      • cancelReservation

        public void cancelReservation(int resv_id)
        This method cancels a reservation based on the reservations' record ID
        Parameters:
        resv_id - the table record ID in the reservations table in the database

      • getBuildingID

        public int getBuildingID(java.lang.String buildingQRName)
        This method returns the record ID for the building based on the QR Name
        Parameters:
        buildingQRName - the building name for the QR code
        Returns:
        building record ID

      • getRoomID

        public int getRoomID(java.lang.String roomQRNum,
                     int buildingID)
        This method returns the record ID for this room having this QR room number
        Parameters:
        roomQRNum - the QR code room number
        buildingID - table record ID for the building
        Returns:
        the record id for the room with this QR room number

      • getUserReservation

        public int getUserReservation(int userRecdID,
                              int buildingRecdID,
                              int roomRecdID)
        This method gets the user, building, and room and checks to see if there is a reservation at this time
        Parameters:
        userRecdID - table record ID of the user
        buildingRecdID - table record ID of the building
        roomRecdID - table record ID for the room
        Returns:
        1 if reservation found, 0 if reservation is not found

      • checkInUser

        public boolean checkInUser(int reservationID,
                           int userRecordID)
        This method takes the reservation's recd id and user's recd ID and checks them into their room
        Parameters:
        reservationID - table record ID for reservation
        userRecordID - table record ID for user
        Returns:
        true if user was checked in, false if not

      • alreadyCheckedIn

        public boolean alreadyCheckedIn(int reservationID)
        This method checks to see if someone has already checked into a room
        Parameters:
        reservationID - record ID of the reservation (reservation table in database)
        Returns:
        true if the user has already checked into their room, false if they have not
